Jason Rogers wrote:

> Two comments:
> 
>   1) We should remain civil... telling someone to "then leave the group"
> just doesn't seem appropriate, though I don't mean to impune anyone's
> professionalism. ;)

Agreed. Allow me to use this as one of my five free idiot moments of 
2004. I have four left.

>   2) Raja, J.B. is a paid professional.  If you desire to have his
> personal input it would behoove you to offer him payment for his
> services.  As I am sure you do not want to do that I respectfully
> suggest that you take what you can get.  This is a public forum and we
> all participate on a voluntary basis.  If you aren't getting an answer
> that satisfies then rephrase the question (as has been suggested).

That's what I was too lazy to say. That said, I /do/ support JUnit. Call 
me for details.
